message.body: What time is your appointment with dr hunt tomorrow
Have you looked at the train schedule. What time is the train
Please don't forget to register for the dc conference
Did you pay
Already did
No they didn't tell me to
Could you double check that because you were the one who said that you are obliged to stay in the hotel and pay $100. Check with some of the youth who are going or call or something
I have to pay Mona or something
Better to clarify the situation tomorrow
Where are you sleeping so that if you are not home by 10 I find a way to get you here so you don't miss the appointment with hunt
I don't know. I might come back. I will let you know
I have to go to bed in about half hour. Please text before that
Don't leave your laptop unattended in the den. High possibility of theft there. OK?
Do you like Dave Matthew Band?
Not really why
Great because I booked the hotel room for you guys in Hershey Park and there is a concert of these people that weekend!! Didn't want us to pay tickets to that too!!!!! #jewishlogic
I just made an appointment for Ortho checkup for you on Wednesday August 14
K
Did you find out about the lodging payment for the dc conference
About 90$
Ok but when do you pay it and how
Check you email NOW
What's al-busy an
Bustan
Check it out online.
I don't know Arabic well enough!
He is your teacher. He knows your level very well and he thinks you can do it . Plus a lot of it is about teaching the kids about Arabic culture. So you can bring in the Lebanese culture
Maybe. Let's see if anybody else has something less nerve-wracking

The camp has started already, I think. You should grab it. Just email him and ask about details. Of when you would start, when do you have to start. Show enthusiasm. It is not nerve wracking because people are thirsty for Arabic speakers no matter what. Your pronunciation alone is superb. It is rare to find someone like you
I want to wait a bit
You might lose the chance. It is not that big a commitment. It is not a life changing decision. Go for it. I think they pay well.
I won't lose it if I wait just two days!
How do you know? Did you ask?
No but obviously they would give me more than one night to decide!!
Yes
Soraya did you hear from Brahim,
What is the problem. Did you check your mail. He's at work will probably get back to you in the evening
Can you pick me up from Rachel's?
I am at penn class
With the car?
Yes
Any news from Brahim
No
Check to see if your email from last night actually went through.
It did
Strange he did not respond
The second one did not work
We can't afford it. Daddy just borrowed money from his mom.
No. You have your whole life in front of you. I wish I were 18 again!!
Please get in touch with Brahim and follow up right away because we haven't heard anything from my friends.ok????
D--- it
I love you I miss you قربونت برم من
I want to hear your voice. It gives me
I meant to say it lifts me up
Oh stop
Will have no service for the next weekend. Love you!
Take care love you too.
